channel.title: TF2 Low Violence removal
channel.description:
I have Team Fortress 2 with low violence but i don't know why. I've tried to remove the low violence folder but it didn't work (Steam just downloaded it again). I have also uninstalled it and removed all the files that was related to TF2. That worked but it went back to low violence a week after or so. And no, I DO NOT HAVE THE GERMAN (censored) EDITION.
Is it because I might have been on a german server once?
Does anybody have any idea about what i should do? :frowning:

item.title: TF2 Low Violence removal
item.dc:creator: Moonpooman
item.description:
Door:

Have you contacted Steam Support about this? They’re probably the best place to ask for help regarding the issue.

pfannkuchen_gesicht:

check if you have -lv in the launch options

Nope, only says -console

Read full topic

item.title: TF2 Low Violence removal
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
check if you have -lv in the launch options

Read full topic

item.title: TF2 Low Violence removal
item.dc:creator: Moonpooman
item.description:
JeffMOD:

extract the gibs from the TF2 GCFs using GCFscape and put them in tf/models.

Will try it, GFC- scape was what i used when i tried to remove the low- violence file.

Door:

Have you contacted Steam Support about this? They’re probably the best place to ask for help regarding the issue.

Sounds like a good idea.

Read full topic

item.title: TF2 Low Violence removal
item.dc:creator: Moonpooman
item.description:
mattemuse:

Violence is bad for you, you shouldn’t be looking at violent things.

I am just getting tired of watching engineers explode into tricycles.

mattemuse:

We all know how Norwegians are.

Too peaceful? Too interested in oil? Too rich?

Read full topic
